issue.title: Not able to visualise ur10 in gzweb / gazebo7

content.raw:
ya there's not much documentation right now. I think it's a good idea to have a tutorial to help ROS users visualize their model in gzweb. A good place for this is in the gazebo tutorials' [gzweb section](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=gzweb). 

You can make a contribution to the [tutorials repo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_tutorials) by following the [instructions here](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=tutorial_contrib&cat=development).

Thanks, and let me know if you have any questions putting the tutorial together.
content.html:
ya there's not much documentation right now. I think it's a good idea to have a tutorial to help ROS users visualize their model in gzweb. A good place for this is in the gazebo tutorials' gzweb section.

You can make a contribution to the tutorials repo by following the instructions here.

Thanks, and let me know if you have any questions putting the tutorial together.
